pending.label: Quoting
pending.message: We are reviewing your request and preparing a custom quote.

quoted.label: Payment Pending
quoted.message: Quote has arrived. Please make a deposit for the quoted amount to start production.

payment_confirmed.label: Payment Confirmed
payment_confirmed.message: Payment has been confirmed. We are preparing according to the production order.

in_progress.label: In Progress
in_progress.message: Our professionals are creating the sheet music. We will notify you when it's completed.

completed.label: Completed
completed.message: Sheet music production is complete. Please download the PDF file below.

alerts.downloadLimitExceeded: You have used all download attempts. Please contact customer service.
alerts.downloadExpired: The download period has expired. Please contact customer service.

warnings.downloadLimitExceeded: Download limit exceeded. Please contact customer service if you need additional downloads.
warnings.downloadPeriodExpired: The download period has expired. Please contact customer service.
